name: input-switch
description: Simple CSS for display checkbox and radio inputs as switch buttons.

scripts.build: npx node-sass src/input-switch.scss dist/input-switch.min.css --output-style=compressed && npx postcss dist/input-switch.min.css --output dist/input-switch.min.css --use autoprefixer --no-map && sed -i 's/[[:space:]]*~[[:space:]]*/~/g' dist/input-switch.min.css

author: Oliver Findl
